reviews.review: Great lecturer, very knowledgeable and approachable.

reviews.review: Very hard exams and unclear grading criteria.

reviews.review: Challenging courses but very rewarding.

reviews.review: Inspiring and passionate about art. Highly recommended!

reviews.review: Good knowledge but lacks enthusiasm in teaching.

reviews.review: Unorganized lectures and very tough exams.
